XenotypeDef.label: baseline norbal
XenotypeDef.description: Norbals are baseline, tribal humans that have been hardened by colder climates. They are hairy and strong, but are unable to deal with high temperatures. They lack in technology but make up for it by mastering the basic weapons that they can forge.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: tribal humans that have been hardened by colder climates
